title: Bug 50550: PropFind 404 error after MkCol success
OB: A PropFind call on a resource returns a 404 error when executed after an MkCol for the same resource.
EB: The MkCol request should be preceded by a PropFind request to trigger the issue.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Execute a PropFind request on a specific resource.
2. Execute an MkCol request on the same resource.
3. Execute another PropFind request on the same resource.

Expected result: The second PropFind request should return a 404 error.

Note: In the access log, the first PropFind request followed by an MkCol request will show a 404 error for the second PropFind request. However, if the first PropFind request is omitted, the second PropFind request will be successful, as shown in the access log example provided.
